net.rtccloud.sdk

Interface RtccEngine


  • public interface RtccEngine
    Rtcc engine singleton. This is the main interface of the SDK.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        void authenticate(Context context,
                String token,
                RtccEngine.UserType userType)
        Asynchronous call.
        Connects to servers with the given uid.
        An AuthenticatedEvent will be fired upon user authentication.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context to use
        token - The token that authenticate this user
        userType - The type of the user
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if context, token or userType is null
        RtccIllegalStateException - if Rtcc.getEngineStatus() is already RtccEngine.Status.AUTHENTICATED, RtccEngine.Status.CONNECTED or RtccEngine.Status.NETWORK_LOST.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Asynchronous call.
        Disconnects the RtccEngine.
        The RtccEngine runs in the background and can consume battery. This call stops it.
        Warning : After this call, Rtcc.instance() will return null until you call Rtcc.initialize(String, Context) to re-create the RtccEngine.
        A ConnectedEvent will be fired upon disconnection with ConnectedEvent.Error.CLOSED value.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if Rtcc.getEngineStatus() is already RtccEngine.Status.DISCONNECTING

      • overrideEncodingParameters

        void overrideEncodingParameters(int maxFps,
                              int maxBitrate,
                              int resolutionDivider)
        Overrides the video encoding parameters.
        Callable anytime after Rtcc has been initialized.
        Parameters are retained until next call. If a parameter is set to 0, its default behaviour is restored.
        Parameters:
        maxFps - maximum framerate [1-30] fps.
        maxBitrate - maximum bitrate in bps [1-1000000] bps.
        resolutionDivider - [1-2]. If 2, output resolution will be downscaled by 2 in width and height, before encoding.

      • overrideEncodingParametersAdvanced

        void overrideEncodingParametersAdvanced(int opusComplexity,
                                      int opusBitrate,
                                      int vp8CpuUsage)
        Overrides the advanced video encoding parameters.
        Callable anytime after Rtcc has been initialized. Parameters are retained until next call.
        Default values are:
        • opusComplexity: 4
        • opusBitrate: 24000
        • vp8CpuUsage: 8
        Parameters:
        opusComplexity - [0 lowest-10 highest]
        opusBitrate - bitrate [16000-64000] bps.
        vp8CpuUsage - [0 intensive-16 minimum cpu usage]

      • getStatus

        void getStatus(String uid)
        Asynchronous call.
        Check if a user can be called.
        A StatusEvent will be fired upon result.
        Parameters:
        uid - The uid of the contact to check
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if uid is null

      • createCall

        void createCall(String uid)
        Asynchronous call.
        Parameters:
        uid - The uid of the contact to call
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if uid is null

      • createCall

        void createCall(String uid,
              Call.StartingOptions options)
        Asynchronous call.
        Creates a call whose recipient is uid, with provided options.
        A CreatedEvent will be fired upon call creation.
        Parameters:
        uid -
        options - The options to apply
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if uid is null

      • getCall

        Call getCall(int callId)
        Returns the call with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        callId - The ID of the call to return.
        Returns:
        The call with the specified ID or null if it doesn't exist.

      • getCurrentCall

        Call getCurrentCall()
        Returns the current Call.CallStatus.ACTIVE call.
        Returns:
        The current Call.CallStatus.ACTIVE call or null if it doesn't exist.

      • getDisplayName

        String getDisplayName()
        Returns:
        The display name used by the application for the authenticated user.

      • setDisplayName

        void setDisplayName(String name)
        Sets the display name used by the application for the authenticated user
        Parameters:
        name - The value to set.

      • goToBackground

        void goToBackground()
        Indicates that you wish to put the RtccEngine in background mode.

        In background mode, the SDK will consume less battery (It will still receive calls).
        You must call goToForeground() before doing anything else in the SDK. Even when you receive a new call, you must call it before Call.resume().

        Using this is optional.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the SDK is already in background mode
        See Also:
        goToForeground()

      • goToForeground

        void goToForeground()
        Indicates that you wish to put the RtccEngine back in foreground mode.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalStateException - if the SDK is already in foreground mode
        See Also:
        goToBackground()

      • isInBackground

        boolean isInBackground()
        Returns:
        true if the RtccEngine is currently in background mode.
        See Also:
        goToBackground(), goToForeground()

      • getVersionFull

        String getVersionFull(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - The Context to use.
        Returns:
        The full version name (SDK version + internal version + application version).

      • sendDataToContact

        boolean sendDataToContact(byte[] data,
                        String contact)
        Send a small chunk of data to a contact.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send. (must be less than 1536 bytes)
        contact - The contact id to send this data.
        Returns:
        true if the data is sent, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if data or contact is null, or if data is greater than 1536 bytes
        See Also:
        replyDataToContact(byte[], int)

      • replyDataToContact

        boolean replyDataToContact(byte[] data,
                         int id)
        Reply a small chunk of data to the contact.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send. (must be less than 1536 bytes)
        id - The contact id to send this data.
        Returns:
        true if the data is sent, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if data is null or greater than 1536 bytes
        See Also:
        sendDataToContact(byte[], String)

      • getMeetingPoint

        MeetingPoint getMeetingPoint(String mpid)
        Returns the MeetingPoint with the specified id.
        This method will always return a non-null value.
        This doesn't necessarily mean the returned MeetingPoint is created.
        Parameters:
        mpid - The id of the MeetingPoint to return
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint with the specified id.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if mpid is null or empty

      • getMeetingPoint

        MeetingPoint getMeetingPoint(String mpid,
                           boolean asHost)
        Returns the MeetingPoint with the specified id.
        This method will always return a non-null value.
        This doesn't necessarily mean the returned MeetingPoint is created.
        Parameters:
        mpid - The id of the MeetingPoint to return
        asHost - true if you are the host of this MeetinPoint, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The MeetingPoint with the specified id.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if mpid is null or empty

      • createMeetingPoint

        void createMeetingPoint(MeetingPoint.Builder builder)
        Asynchronous call.
        Creates a Meeting with the provided MeetingPoint.Builder.
        A StatusEvent with StatusEvent.Type equals to StatusEvent.Type.CREATED will be fired upon MeetingPoint creation.
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder to use
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if builder is null
